title: Subpart 1725-2 - Responsibilities Of Board Of Directors
content:
Subpart 1725-2 - Responsibilities Of Board Of Directors

State Regulations
§ 1725-2.1 - Responsibility to public
§ 1725-2.2 - Responsibility to local community
§ 1725-2.3 - Responsibility to tenants
§ 1725-2.4 - Disclosure of information
§ 1725-2.5 - Repealed

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
